{{Wired embedded system |brand=Orange Pi |model=OPI R1 |revision=Plus LTS |asin=B09M413HR5 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Shenzhen Xunlong |price=28 |est_release_date=11/2021 |type=single-board computer, router |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=USB Female Type-C |cpu1_brand=Rockchip |cpu1_model=RK3328 |cpu1_cspeed=1.5 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Zbit Semi |fla1_model=ZB25VQ128ASIG |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=Allwinner |ram1_model=ATL3A0832-S12 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial=yes,, 3-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (1500000 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8153B |eth_chip3_brand=Motorcomm |eth_chip3_model=YT8531C |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=Power Management IC w/RTC;Rockchip;RK805-1;;1;,,, 2K I2C Serial EEPROM<!-- w/ EUI-48 Node Identity-->;Microchip;NC-24AA025E48T-I/OT;;1;,,, 5V 1A USB Power Distribution Switch;Silergy;SY6280AAC;;1;,,, 400mA 1.25V Adjustable LDO Voltage Regulator;MicrOne;ME6221;;1; |flags=Micro SD Card slot, RTC |stock_boot=U-Boot;2017.09; |stock_os=Linux;5.10.75;Ubuntu; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt, Debian, Armbian, Android 9 |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |default_user=root |default_pass=orangepi |oui_eth=C0:74:2B }} {{TagLine|Open-source Single-board Computer/Soft Router}} :[http://www.orangepi.org/Orange%20Pi%20R1%20Plus%20LTS/ Product page]
*[https://www.cnx-software.com/2021/11/17/orange-pi-r1-plus-lts-cheaper-dual-gbe-sbc-yt8531c-ethernet-phy/ ''Orange Pi R1 Plus LTS is a cheaper dual GbE SBC'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2022/02/12/orange-pi-r1-plus-lts-metal-enclosure/ ''Orange Pi R1 Plus LTS sells with metal enclosure'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[https://openwrt.org/toh/xunlong/orange_pi_r1_plus ''Xunlong Orange Pi R1 Plus / R1 Plus LTS'' on '''OpenWrt''' (ToH)]
{{See also|List of Single-board computers}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Rockchip]]'' RK3328 @1.5GHz Quad-Core ARM (Cortex-A53) :64-bit ARMv8 CPU with NEON and Crypto Extensions *Onboard Storage: 16MB (SPI NOR) flash :TF card (max.64GB)/MMC card slot *Memory: 1GB (LPDDR3) SDRAM *USB: 1x USB 2.0 port *Power Source: 5V/2A via USB Type-C
{{WikiDevi.Wi-Cat.RU:Network/Orange Pi models}}
